#### ℹ️ Repository information

// General overview of the repository's key features and criteria.
**The repository has**:

- [ ] At least three issues with the `good first issue` label. // Ensures there are beginner-friendly issues for new contributors.
- [ ] At least 10 contributors. // Indicates a healthy level of activity and community support in the repository.
- [ ] Detailed setup instructions for the project. // Provides clear guidelines to help users set up and run the project locally.
- [ ] CONTRIBUTING.md // A file that outlines the contributing guidelines for participants.
- [ ] Actively maintained. // Confirms the repository is receiving updates and is not abandoned.
